name: Baggy & Maggy
description:
Game

Maggy the Mug is getting cold, help her stay warm and happy!  

Embark in an adventure as Baggy the tea bag to keep Maggy warm as much as you can, before her cold and inevitable fate.

Baggy & Maggy is a cute platformer adventure game across two worlds, featuring many gameplay mechanics and 6 unique achievements to collect!

Controls

 🇦  🇩 or ⬅️ ➡️ to move left and right.  
🇼  or ⬆️ to jump.  
Left click to interact with gameplay elements.  
Escape to quit the game.
🇷  Reset the rope (If it ever gets stuck inside a collision...)

Assets

Everything in this game has been made in the course of Ludum Dare 50, including:

  • All gameplay mechanics
  • All graphics
  • All musics and sounds
  • All sound effects

Exceptions :

  • Rope base code found Here
  • Our splash screen logo, made by us in advance ;)
Tools
  • Game engine: Unity
  • Pixel art: GraphicsGale, GIMP
  • Music: FL Studio
  • Sounds: Audacity

Made by Revetoon & JojoPalambas. 

Ludum Dare Page

Hope you'll like the game <3
